Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 28th overall pick, by San Diego in 2006...
Traded from San Diego to Cleveland on 6/19/2006 (Going to CLE: C J. Hester, LF C. Gillespie. Going to SDN: C J. Knoedler)...
Traded from Cleveland to San Diego on 2/8/2008 (Going to SDN: P G. Mock, LF C. Gillespie. Going to CLE: SS D. Jeter)...
Had first career hit (double) on 4/7/2009, off Shawn Sedlacek (ARI)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/7/2009, off Shawn Sedlacek (ARI)...
Won Rookie of the Year Award in 2009, hitting .228 with 9 HR, 53 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2009...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2010...
Injured on 10/3/2011 with a Inflamed Posterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 3 weeks...
Had 5 hits with 4 RBI against Boston on 6/1/2013...
Won World Championship with San Diego in 2014...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2015...
Traded from San Diego to Kansas City on 4/13/2017 (Going to SDN: P L. Stewart Jr.. Going to KCA: RF R. Vilas, SS P. Janish, CF C. Gillespie)...
Won Player of the Week award on 7/10/2017, hitting .524 with 2 HR, 3 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/18/2017, hitting .565 with 1 HR, 7 RBI...
Won Player of the Week award on 5/20/2019, hitting .560 with 2 HR, 10 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Rightfield in 2019...
Injured on 9/26/2020 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Had 2000th career hit on 10/2/2021, off Michael Linhart (BAL)...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 2/27/2022 to a 1-year deal worth $1,080,000 per year...
Signed as a free agent by Toronto on 3/1/2023 to a minor league contract.
Injured on 5/10/2023 with a Bruised Hand, out for 4 days...
Injured on 5/19/2023 with a Bruised Heel, out for 5 days...
